attributes.action: BRING OUR TROOPS HOME FROM AFGANISTAN AND IRAQ BEFORE ANYMORE DIE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like Mr Gordon Brown to finally bring home all our male and female troops from afganistan and iraq. to many lifes have been lost and to many lifes have been changed. our troops are coming home in coffins or seriously injured. please bring them home the uk wants its men and women back alive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
